automation.title: Automations

security.title: Your data protected with
security.description: We implement market best practices to ensure your data and your customers' data are always protected.
items: AES-256 encryption at rest and in transit
security.seeDetails: See detailed explanation of each protection
security.clickToLearn: Click each badge to understand what it means

highlightExplanations.uptime: The system stays online virtually all the time - less than 9 hours of maintenance per year
highlightExplanations.response: Your actions are processed in less than the blink of an eye - ultra fast
highlightExplanations.encryption: Your data is encoded with the same level of security used by banks
highlightExplanations.compliance: We follow data protection law - your data, your rights

ssl.label: SSL/TLS
ssl.explanation: The lock that appears in your browser. Ensures no one can intercept your data while browsing.

waf.label: WAF
waf.explanation: A digital "guard" that automatically blocks attack attempts before they reach the system.

sast.label: SAST/DAST
sast.explanation: Robots that constantly analyze the code looking for vulnerabilities, like an advanced antivirus.

soc2.label: SOC 2
soc2.explanation: American certification that proves we follow the world's best security practices.

lgpd.label: LGPD
lgpd.explanation: Compliance with Brazil's General Data Protection Law. You have full control over your data.

gdpr.label: GDPR
gdpr.explanation: Compliance with the world's most stringent data protection law, from the European Union.

meta.title: How It Was Made | DevForge
meta.description: Discover the architecture and technologies behind DevForge

hero.title: Built with the
hero.description: DevForge is an enterprise-grade template that demonstrates modern architecture, best practices, and AI integration.

about.transparency: Total transparency: we explain every choice in simple terms

whyTech.title: Why these technologies?
whyTech.description: Each technology was carefully chosen. We don't use what's cheapest or easiest - we use what the world's largest companies use. Below we explain each choice and show who else trusts these tools.

techStack.title: Tech Stack
techStack.subtitle: Modern and battle-tested technologies
techStack.intro: We use the same technologies as companies like Netflix, Uber, and Airbnb. Below we explain what each one does and why it's the best option.

categories.frontend: The visual part you see and interact with - buttons, forms, menus
categories.backend: The "behind the scenes" part that processes data and keeps everything running
categories.ai: Artificial Intelligence that automates tasks and generates insights
categories.devops: Tools that keep the system always online and working well

architecture.title: Layered Architecture
architecture.subtitle: Clear separation of responsibilities
architecture.intro: The system is organized in layers, like a building. Each floor has a specific function, and together they form a solid structure.

layers.presentation: Everything you see on screen - menus, buttons, forms
layers.apiRoutes: Entry gates that verify and direct your requests
layers.services: The "brain" that processes your information and executes actions
layers.infrastructure: The solid foundation where your data is stored securely

security.title: 18 Security Layers
security.subtitle: Complete protection across all application layers
security.intro: We don't use technical jargon to impress. Below we explain each protection in a way anyone can understand its real value.

timeline.title: Development Roadmap
timeline.subtitle: Built in 4 incremental phases
timeline.intro: The project was built in phases, each adding more value. All phases have been completed successfully.

credits.title: Developed with AI
credits.description: This project was developed in partnership with Claude Code (Anthropic), demonstrating how AI can accelerate quality software development.

meta.title: Plans and Pricing | DevForge
meta.description: Choose the ideal plan for your surveys and feedback

hero.title: Choose the ideal plan for
hero.description: Start for free and upgrade when you need. No hidden fees, no surprises.

comparison.title: Full Comparison
comparison.subtitle: See all features of each plan

q1.question: Can I cancel anytime?
q1.answer: Yes! You can cancel your subscription at any time. You'll continue to have access until the end of the paid period.

q2.question: What happens if I exceed the response limit?
q2.answer: You'll receive a warning when you're close to the limit. Excess responses will be stored, but you'll need to upgrade to access the complete data.

q3.question: Do you offer a discount for annual payment?
q3.answer: Yes! Annual payments have a 20% discount. Contact us for more information.

q4.question: Can I change plans later?
q4.answer: Of course! You can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time. Changes are applied immediately.

q5.question: Is my data secure?
q5.answer: Absolutely! We use bank-level encryption (256-bit), firewall-protected servers, and comply with LGPD and GDPR. Your data is never shared with third parties.

q6.question: How does support work?
q6.answer: Free plan: email support within 48h. Pro plan: priority support within 24h. Enterprise: dedicated account manager with response within 4h.

cta.title: Ready to start?
cta.description: Join thousands of companies using DevForge to collect feedback and improve their products.

meta.title: Privacy Policy - DevForge
meta.description: Learn how we protect your data and respect your privacy.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.description: How we collect, use, and protect your information

collection.title: Data Collection
collection.content:
We collect only the information necessary to provide our services:

• Registration data (name, email)
• Platform usage information
• Survey responses (anonymized when requested)

security.title: Data Security
security.content:
We use 18 security layers to protect your information:

• End-to-end encryption
• Secure storage on certified servers
• 24/7 threat monitoring

usage.title: Data Usage
usage.content:
Your data is used exclusively to:

• Provide and improve our services
• Generate requested reports and analyses
• Send important communications about your account

rights.title: Your Rights (GDPR)
rights.content:
You have the right to:

• Access your personal data
• Correct inaccurate information
• Request deletion of your data
• Export your data in a portable format

meta.title: Terms of Use - DevForge
meta.description: Read the terms and conditions for using the DevForge platform.

terms.title: Terms of Use
terms.description: Conditions for using the DevForge platform
terms.contact: Questions about terms? Contact us: contact@devforge.com

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing and using the DevForge platform, you agree to these terms of use. If you do not agree with any part, do not use our services.

usage.title: Platform Usage
usage.content:
DevForge offers a platform for creating surveys and collecting feedback. You are responsible for:

• Maintaining your account security
• Ensuring the accuracy of provided information
• Respecting third-party rights

restrictions.title: Usage Restrictions
restrictions.content:
It is expressly prohibited to:

• Use the platform for illegal purposes
• Collect data without proper consent
• Attempt to access unauthorized systems or data
• Distribute malware or malicious content

liability.title: Limitation of Liability
liability.content:
DevForge is not responsible for:

• Content created by users
• Temporary service interruptions
• Indirect damages arising from platform use

Our maximum liability is limited to the amount paid for services.
